They are undeniably soulmates, and while I could have felt even stronger about them, I still found their relationship both cute and emotional. I admired Gwen for standing up for herself and leaving Truett, despite the lack of choice he offered her. Unfortunately, I couldn't overlook how he hurt her. Overall, neither character left me feeling particularly enamored with them.
While I didn't enjoy the book overall, it still moved me to tears multiple times. Just when I thought I had finished crying, the emotions struck me again.
